AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: driver of the truck and trailer, made troubling statements during questioning, previously smuggled aliens and drugs using his 18-wheeler
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator with 17 years of experience, strongly suspected Saldana was transporting a load of dope
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: officer who stopped Saldana for traffic violations, involved in the search and investigation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer
